amendment.description: Amendment makes available loans for a demonstration program in North Carolina to evaluate the use of modular housing for those who have lost housing because of a major disaster.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide up to $5,4000,000 for use in a demonstration program to be carried out by the Secretary of Agriculture to determine the timeliness, quality, suitability, efficiency, and cost of utilizing modular housing to re-house low-income elderly families who have lost their homes due to a major disaster or because they are unable to repay a direct housing loan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clayton amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
